tasks.name: Unified Client-Document Creation Form
tasks.description: Enhance the document creation form to allow creating new clients and documents in a single interface
tasks.prompt_template:
if you look at@create.html  it first requires the customer reference number, but i want a situation where the user can create a new client based on the reference number and fill in other related client related info and  create the document all in one template.

Please try to maximize the UI/UX experience.

Try to minimize the chances where the user accidentally create a new client but the client id already exists.
